body:
Nice webpage, Peter.  Perhaps you could offer a handy link to the 
Radiance reference page from there as well 
<http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/refer.html>, or we could collect just 
the parts that relate to modifications and additions.  It does seem 
like a top-level documentation breakdown would be helpful, as Carsten 
suggests.  Thanks for your input, Carsten.


-Greg
___
